Reviews.Title: “OK for a late-night arrival”
Reviews.Author: FoodAddictPEI
Reviews.Content: Our flight to Vegas arrived very late on a Saturday night, so we didn't want to pay hundreds of dollars for a strip hotel that we'd be too tired to enjoy. This was close to the airport, cheap and clean. The beds were very comfortable and we didn't have a problem with airport noise. However, the airport shuttle apparently stops running at 11pm, so we had to get a cab (only about $10, so no big deal). This hotel certainly served it's purpose as a place to crash after a late-night flight, before moving to a better hotel the next day. But I wouldn't recommend it for your entire Vegas vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Great Front Desk Staff, Unreliable Courtesy Shuttle”
Reviews.Author: travelmaster75
Reviews.Content: The Best Western McCarran is 2 blocks, or about 1 mile away from the strip. If your looking for basic hotel accomodations, away from the strip this hotel is perfect Rooms are very comnfortable, rates are great. and the hotel offers a complimentary breakfast, The front desk staff is very courteous and caring. I recall two front desk agents, that were very nice and caring during my stay. The morning agent, I don't recall her name, and the PM Agent, Candice, were very nice and accomodating. I would return, for caring people like them, who represent the company well, with their hardwork, and dedication to their guests. On the other hand, during my stay, I experienced several delayed shuttles, which made this stay somewhat difficult. Upon arriving to the airport, it took, several calls, before the shuttle driver came. In total I waited over 40 minutes, for a courtesy shuttle, that comes every 30 minutes. I was told by the driver, trafffic was bad, however the airport is 5 minutes away from the hotel. That same, night, I had to go back to the airport, and experienced the same senario, with a extremely delayed shuttle, despite calling the hotel several times. On my last day, I requested the shuttle from the Tropicana hotel, which again, came late, by about 30 minutes after the schduled pickup time. I'm sure traffic and weather delays affect arrivial time with the shuttle, however, to wait this long several times, for a courtey shuttle, thats operates close to the airport and strip, sounds odd. I definitly think, work needs to be done to correct arrival time for the shutte. As the saying goes, once is a experience, twice is a problem, three times is a trend. I really hope this experience is corrected for future guests.

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel bad service”
Reviews.Author: boca_penguins
Reviews.Content: The first impression they gave me was leaving me and my kids waiting in the cold because the airport shuttle was 25 minutes late. The hotel is right next to the airport, there is no reason why they shouldn't be there on time. Other than that the hotel serves its purpose, a place to sleep so I can rent my car in the morning and get out of Vegas as fast as possible.

Reviews.Title: “Greatly surprised!”
Reviews.Author: pooka54
Reviews.Content: Check-in was a breeze. The young woman at the front desk was very charming and friendly. She was very proficient and informative. The hotel had me assigned a room on the second floor, and I requested to moved to the third. The clerk checked availability and reassigned me without hesitation. I informed her I would only have the rental car for more than a couple of hours. She immediately gave me simple concise directions to the rental return garage, and informed me how to return to the hotel. My room was very clean and well furnished. The bed was turned down and extremely comfortable to sleep in. There were ear plugs on the night stand as the airport is nearby. I opted not use them as I don't sleep well with them in my ears. I am happy with my decision as I only heard two planes the entire night. The only issue I had concerning the room was the toilet. It was tiny and very low to the ground. Therefore, it was not comfortable to use. The hotel offered a complimentary continental breakfast. The standard bill of fare that filled the void. Checkout was a breeze and the free shuttle to the airport was quick and painless. Overall, I was greatly surprised based on some of the reviews I had read. The hotel was clean and comfortable, and all the staff I encountered were extremely polite and friendly. The best thing is that the hotel is a non-smoking facility which is a rarity in Las Vegas. I would not hesitate to book another stay at Best Western McCarran Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: bjf1209
Reviews.Content: Great room...good breakfast but you should advertise your waffles!! It is very close to the strip and very easy to drive to other locations in and around Vegas. The staff was very friendly and helpful. It was also helpful to be able to use the computer area and pick up a snack in the lobby any time of the day. the room was nice and included a microwave and fridge. There was also a nice sitting area which was very comfortable. I am a very light sleeper but had a great nights sleep even though the airport is very close. The daytime noise is noticeable but it was not disturbing during the night.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Value”
Reviews.Author: PT_2012
Reviews.Content: The Breakfast was good, the room was clean, the staff was friendly and helpful. It was a very good value for the money we spent. The only negative was the noise of airplanes (not very bad) in the morning for which they had provided ear plugs, but I would take the noise for the money saved. We were there for just one night to catch our flight the next day. We got a ride to Airport on their shuttle.

Reviews.Title: “Our stay”
Reviews.Author: Jim M
Reviews.Content: Staff was very friendly and knowledgeable. Room was clean and well ordered. Shuttle driver was very knowledgeable of airport. We were given ear plugs (jet noise- so close to airport) but for me it was not that noisy.Left too early to take advantage of breakfast. The park and fly option saved us a good deal of money the closeness allowed a sleep of an additional hour and still make flight

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Price - Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mparay
Reviews.Content: If you would like not to spend your money to accommodation (especially weekend) you should try this hotel. Clean and comfortable rooms. Good breakfast. 2 minutes to strip with cab or shuttle.

Reviews.Title: “New Years Eve”
Reviews.Author: AlbertaEdmontonGuy
Reviews.Content: This is branching off of my review for The Mirage, We booked this hotel using my buddies points, as hotel room rates sky rocketed on the strip for New Years Eve, this was the best free alternative. The beds are comfy, lobby is neat, open concept and had friendly staff. The hotel has a pool, and lobby had free fruits and lemon water available all of the time. Keep in mind this hotel is older, and located at the airport, so you can hear airplanes a little bit, if you're a light sleeper. The hotel has a gas station right across, perfect for drinks and booze. We walked from the hotel to the strip for fireworks and partying, which WAS a little bit of a walk, but it wasn't too bad. All in all, the hotel was a good alternative to staying on the strip, or staying close to the airport for fast travel to the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Older Hotel but great comfy beds”
Reviews.Author: Patriciamcinnis55
Reviews.Content: We stayed here Dec 30th because it was the best deal around so close to New Years Eve. The staff was extremely friendly, the bed was SO soft & comfy. The elevator smelled pretty funky all the time, not sure what that was but the room smelled fine. Since it's right beside the airport, you can feel & hear the planes big time. depends on which runway they're using that day. They do offer a frequent free shuttle to the airport. They do offer free coffee & cookies during the day & a free continental breakfast from 6-10am including hot waffles! Yes, it's an older, smaller hotel but the staff made up for any shortcomings.

Reviews.Title: “Great customer service!”
Reviews.Author: G S
Reviews.Content: Breakfast, nice room, excellent service oriented staff, and good amenities. The general manager and the front desk staff were always kind and helpful. Hotel manager ran the show as if he had been doing this since he was born, was professional and extremely personable. Courteous and helpful(above and beyond what is expected). The rooms are comfortable and pleasant. Definately a good and affordable hotel in Las Vegas. Good location, close to the airport, and free shuttle.

Reviews.Title: “Gem of a Hotel”
Reviews.Author: HobbsJ001
Reviews.Content: Was in Las Vegas week for business and stay at Best Western McCarran Inn. The hotel was recommended to me by a friend of mine. She was right on the mark with this one. The hotel was located right next to the airport and only a short distance from the Strip. They do offer a free shuttle to both, so that was a bonus. I highly recommend this hotel to all. Loved all the free items that they offer Shuttle, Breakfast, internet, cookies and much more. Thank you to all the staff at best western Mccarran, you made my stay very enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “A great, great, really great Hotel !”
Reviews.Author: netseaman
Reviews.Content: Best Western McCarran Inn is the Hotel with the best relationship between price and service quality, where I already have been in all my life ! I have been there during two complete weeks last month, and it was just magnific ! For the short price paid, we get a large, confortable, and clean room, plus free buffet breakfast, plus free shuttle bus every hour to the Airport and the Strip, plus free coffee, fruits, and cakes, allways available in the reception area, plus free pc acess, plus free wireless acess, plus free all the necessary toileteries, plus free swimming poll, and plus, plus, plus, ... And mainly, this Hotel has one of the best staff that I have meet before . Everyone are very friendly, very helpful, allways doing their best in order to assure us a very nice stay ! You do not believe ? So, please go there, see and comprove by your own ! For myself, my family, friends, colleagues and everyone that ask me I have no doubt to recoment allways this Hotel ! For me, Las Vegas means Best Western McCarran Inn !!!

Reviews.Title: “good stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: Yazmin P
Reviews.Content: good stay, if you are ok with the noises from the airplanes... the rooms are really nice and clean...

Reviews.Title: “Very handy for one night in Vegas”
Reviews.Author: TravellingM
Reviews.Content: Staff were very helpful, rooms large and clean and close to the airport. We had to change rooms as we were right next to a very noisy vending machine. Not a problem though as they moved us straight away. My husband heard a lot of air traffic over night but i didn't, you are next to the airport though so you would expect that type of noise. There is a free shuttle that takes you where you want on the strip which is great, the only slight problem is if you do have to get a Vegas taxi, they don't know where the hotel is! They were asking us for directions, we'd only landed a few hours ago so didn't really know! That's not the fault of the hotel as it's just off the strip but something to bare in mind, keep a map of where the hotel is in your bag, even with the address the taxi drivers were lost! I'd definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “AN ECONOMICAL PALCE TO STAY IN LAS VEGAS”
Reviews.Author: CLARECM
Reviews.Content: Shuttle pick up at the airport is from Terminal #1 the international terminal is #2 but there is free ground transport or an easy walk to the pick up area at terminal#1...you need to call the hotel for pick up...I asked a local to call for me as I do not carry a cell phone.....the hotel is very isolated so if you want to eat...do so before going to the hotel........the king size bed was very comfortable ...lots of pillows....more towels would have been nice...the breakfast area is cheery with a sky light over a nice dining room near the free breakfast food..make your own waffles and warm hard boiled eggs were the highlites for me.....transport to the strip is on the hour and pick up point is the flamingo hotel...the bell desk there will call for the pick up for you...we enjoyed a starbucks coffee there and a comfortable waiting area after a long day on the strip

Reviews.Title: “Just an okay place to stay”
Reviews.Author: DiegoFlorida
Reviews.Content: We stayed here mainly due to the inexpensive rate listed online. Don't expect a swanky place when booking here. We had a slight problem when we arrived. Although we had a confirmation sheet with a booking number the person behind the desk insisted we had cancelled our reservation a few days earlier, which we had not done. Anyhow, since they still had plenty of rooms left we were able to book another one at the same low rate. The room was okay. It was clean and large in size but needed some updating. The place is located about 2 miles from the airport and we did not find it noisy at all. They had a full complimentary breakfast with seating in the dreary lobby. The food was okay but the hotel decor is shabby looking. The place is not bad if you want a really good deal, but I think we will look for something a little more updated in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap Hotel near the Las Vegas Strip”
Reviews.Author: rainner d
Reviews.Content: Hotel rates are expensive now a days specially weekend in las vegas,nevada. I discovered this hotel near McCarran Airport (2 min drive) and 5 min away to the strip. Instead of getting hotels along the strip you will save a lot of money by staying at Best Western. My wife also love their self serve breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Sucked!”
Reviews.Author: Billie s
Reviews.Content: Pretty much the worst experience I have ever had at any Hotel! Broken glass on sidewalk cut my friends foot extremely bad and after telling them it was still there 3 days later, no offer of medicine or a bandaid. They gave a card key to some old guy that just about tore the security lock off our door trying to get in, their response was, he's ok. My reply, are we ok? No apology! Most employees obviously did not like their job and were rude ( the desk help). The housekeepers could not understand enough english to help w/ anything we asked for. People fighting in room next door and locking each other out so the other would beat on the door. Alarm in empty room next door going off for hours in the very early Am ( Like 1:00), had to ask desk help to shut it off, their response was why didn't you call instead of walking to desk. Homeless people going through the garbage cans just outside our window and an all night Postal dist that yelled 24 hrs a day on an intercom system just a stones throw away!

Reviews.Title: “Much better than expected.”
Reviews.Author: Victor S
Reviews.Content: Room and overall property was very clean. Service personnel were friendly and helpful. Desk clerk was available in the after-hours for late registration. Continental breakfast at the property was generous. Noise level was never an issue. All room equipment worked. Plenty of easy access parking space. Free shuttle to the strip. Best Western McCarran Inn was definitely a great alternative. We will definitely come back to the Inn again.

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly good”
Reviews.Author: Thomas L
Reviews.Content: I thought right next to the airport would be noisy but it was not. Excellent breakfast. Great shuttle service to airport

Reviews.Title: “Great location to airport, but that's it.”
Reviews.Author: doxieladytitusville
Reviews.Content: Older hotel, virtually on the airport property. It took 3 calls and 40 minutes for the driver to pick us up from the airport. Then neither he nor the other guy in the van (friend? trainee?) spoke any English. Happily going back to the airport at 0500, he was on time! No coffee early AM. The desk clerk printed out boarding passes and then became upset when I asked him to reprint as a coupon did not print with it. He just turned the keyboard and screen around to the counter and told me to try. Well, they still didn't print properly, but that could have been a Delta problem. Absolutely no food very close by-gas station or very overpriced room service menu from local restaurant service. About 15 minute walk up the road there were lots of places. They offer a shuttle to the strip, but we were afraid that our return shuttle to the hotel may never appear. Just one night. Next time I will try someplace else. Other options with better prices with a shuttle service.

Reviews.Title: “Shuttle disaster”
Reviews.Author: EdwardJAllen
Reviews.Content: Standard fayre for a lower cost Best Western, but we found thew shuttle service to be very patchy (little clear info on stops, times etc) and the driver we had couldn't speak any English and was just plain indifferent to his passengers, so we ended up being dropped off nowhere near where we expected, leading to a 20 minute walk in the dusty heat of Vegas! Nice. Some good, and some bad staff. luck of the draw. View from our window was a wall about 4 foot away (well at least we could walk around naked if we wanted too!) Oh, did I mention the planes? bring your ear muffs.

Reviews.Title: “Old but cheap and clean”
Reviews.Author: LWvisitor_11
Reviews.Content: This hotel was perfect for us. We landed late one evening and were leaving for the Grand Canyon first thing the next morning. It is nothing fancy, in fact everything seemed quite old, but the room was very clean. The price was great and it even included a nice breakfast!

Reviews.Title: “Good Alternate for "Off the Strip" Hotel”
Reviews.Author: greg2mar
Reviews.Content: We went to Las Vegas to see a race & some sights, not to gamble. So, we wanted a hotel near the airport (early return flight out) & we picked this hotel with a Travelocity deal. Our room wasn't ready when we got there, so they gave another room (2 doubles vs king). The room was clean and comfortable and not overly noisy--it faced the pool but the breakfast room was right next door. I know some people complained about the noises from the planes but we live near Dulles Airport & quite frankly it is louder at home than it was at the McCarren. The hotel does leave ear plugs on the night stand for those who might have trouble sleeping. We didn't care for the breakfast bar at all.The skim milk didn't taste right at all & the waffles were rubbery. We found a local restaurant for breakfast the next morning,

Reviews.Title: “Wish we stayed somewhere else.”
Reviews.Author: kybaseballmom
Reviews.Content: This was the 6th hotel we stayed in on our recent trip, and this was one of the worst. Rooms were small and overall the hotel just had a dated/dingy feel. Of course you're close the the airport, so there's the noise factor as well. With so many hotel options in Vegas, I'd find another place.

Reviews.Title: “For short stay good choice”
Reviews.Author: sedum37
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one evening on our way to the national parks in Arizona and Utah. It served its purpose. If visiting Las Vegas for the dining and casinos I would recommend choosing another hotel as it is not convenient or close to these options. It is very inexpensive if just stoppping over (be sure to check out senior and AAA discounts). Great breakfast included. For the price and location was a good option for us. One complaint: the room smelled musty upon arrival. After running the AC for a while it was ok. Didn't change rooms or complain to management since we were there only one night and wanted to get to sleep to get an early start the next day.

Reviews.Title: “Not What We Expected”
Reviews.Author: luvstravel2
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the last night of a 15 day trip because of the convenience to the airport and free shuttle service. We had to return our rental car that evening because we needed to be at the airport the next morning at 5 am. We were told by the front desk to take the rental car shuttle back to the airport, give McCarran Inn a call, and they would pick us up within 1/2 hour. When we called them at 7:05 pm, we were told we would be picked up at 7:30. At 7:45 I called again, and the person at the front desk said he would look into it and someone would be right there. Finally at 8:10 the shuttle arrived and the driver said he was never told earlier that anyone was waiting for him. If we thought it would take that long, we would have taken a cab back to the hotel. The front desk just shrugged when we told them we were unhappy with their service. Once in the room, the air conditioner would turn on for about 5 minutes and then shut off. It was extremely stuffy and hot in the room and no matter how my husband adjusted the a/c, it provided no relief and perspired all night. We could not participate in the breakfast since we left too early but the morning shuttle did leave on time as there were a number of other passengers taking it. Overall, we would look for a different location with free airport shuttle service if we came again.

Reviews.Title: “Just the job!”
Reviews.Author: dandb
Reviews.Content: This hotel was the just job for our first night after landing in Las Vegas and setting off on our National Parks Road Trip the next morning. We landed at 7.00pm Las Vegas time (which I think put us on 3am the following day UK time), there was no way we were up to a 3 hour drive to Zion in the dark and so tired too! It was a good decision to do this! The hotel was great, the rooms were absolutely fine, complimentry breakfast a bonus (although basic). The staff were very welcoming and helpful, I would certainly recommend this hotel for those needing the convenience to or from airport.

Reviews.Title: “comfortable beds”
Reviews.Author: Caldwellbelle
Reviews.Content: Usually stay on the strip but because of the Ortiz/Merryweather fight everything was booked or very expensive. The room was clean and the bed oh sooo comfortable. We used the free shuttle to the airport and the strip, the drivers were very polite and helpful. Cookies, coffee, and water refreshing after spending the day on the strip. Breakfast area clean, breakfast okay. Free internet. We would definetly stay here again. Do not waste your time or money with the CSI experience, it was boring and employees running you through like cattle.

Reviews.Title: “ehhhh.. what do you expect?!!”
Reviews.Author: luminousss
Reviews.Content: sooo we stayed at the signature MGM for 5 beautiful days in Vegas and that hotel was amazing. However, we checked out today Sep 15th from the signature coz our flight is at 6 A.M Sep.16; we didn't want to pay for another night.we spent the whole day at the strip then we came here to the best western at 1 A.m to spend 3 hours before our flight. 1- receptionist extremely rude. 2 -gloomy corridor. 3 -cramp . 4-room relatively clean. conclusion: we wish we had stayed at the signature. P.s : free internet

Reviews.Title: “Great price, nice staff and even a couple of frills thrown in”
Reviews.Author: Minklechicken
Reviews.Content: Last year we stayed on the strip and this year I was adamant we should stay somewhere else as I sang Beyonce for weeks afterwards (a song being played on the loop last year at Luxor). Apart from one, I always had a good experience in Best Western so we booked it for 2 nights in Vegas this year. Great price. Great points; price, lovely staff, cookies and coffee and cold water at the reception 24 hours, comfy bed and all the channels. We asked to be placed on top floor where we can sleep and they obliged. Although nothing special, I actually liked the feel of the hotel inside, it had a nice atmosphere. Breakfast was not amazing but rather standard across such hotels and to be honest, for the price it was great. Not so great: room was overlooking the garbage and the garbage truck woke us up very early. Still I cannot say this is a fault of the hotel in any way. I did not hear the planes, but then again I grew up next to the airport and react more to man made noise. They did provide toiletries that went beyond the usual: hair gel, make up remover wipes and earplugs. Five stars for trying. The only thing I would say is they should explain to people that the room key needs to be inserted in the eco thing that regulates the air con. We did not know that first night and kept waking up to boost it. I did not notice it at the reception and this is the first hotel that had this system so I had no clue. Overall - totally no complaints. I asked if we can check out a bit later and they said fine straight away - didn't need it in the end but it is nice to know they try to make it as good as possible for customers.

Reviews.Title: “renovated room but noise problem”
Reviews.Author: Kazzuzu
Reviews.Content: room was updated and renovated. clean room. Front Desk stuff was nice. breakfast area was okay. but we enjoyed what they offered. simple continental breakfast with waffle maker! its conveniently located close to airport and its only 5 minutes drive to the strip too. but there was noise problem, and airplane noise woke me up early morning... I will recommend this place for people leaving to airport next day. without noise, it was pretty good for what you are paying.

Reviews.Title: “COMING BACK TO THIS HOTEL WILL BE AN UNDERSTATEMENT”
Reviews.Author: bong v
Reviews.Content: Great customer sevice and cleanliness is what sets this Inn apart from the rest! My family felt easily at home! The rooms are kept so clean and organized. Amenities are countless and the place is so strategically located i.e. airport and strip accessible. Checking in and out was a breeze as if they have everything systematically in place. Whoever is managing this property is doing an excellent job! Simply put, our stay in this hotel was an overwhelming experience! I can't wait to come back! BVentura and Family

Reviews.Title: “My wife loved it, I was under impressed.”
Reviews.Author: homer17402
Reviews.Content: We arrived late to a very gracious front desk clerk. Parking lot was full. There were free cookies, coffee and water in the lobby. The room had great beds and was just off the lobby. I was worried it would be noisy but we had none. The carpet in the room and the paint looked very old and the TV was pretty ancient with a couple fuzzy channels. My wife is very picky but she liked it. Free internet, no resort fee and free convenient parking were plusses. It is also very close to the airport and rental car return. For one night it was fine.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME STAFF”
Reviews.Author: SIMONGONZ
Reviews.Content: I very much like the location,very much acceseble to everything. Shuttle service was very easy,as soon as i got out of baggage shuttle is out there and very helpful in loading my baggages.Rooms are very descent and clean. Also like the convinience of having energy drinks on my floor. Breakfast was superb,hot food served and enough. Front desk staff were warm,accomodating and helpful. Will definitely come back and recomend it to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “we loved it”
Reviews.Author: Dan C
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at Best Western McCarran last weekend and had a great time. The kids loved the fresh baked cookies in the afternoon. The room we had was spaciious. Great hotel, good location and great staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, we'll be back!"”
Reviews.Author: Ethan M
Reviews.Content: My film crew and I recently stayed here for a video shoot. It was a perfect home base, close to the airport and everything else at a great rate. We all appreciated the prompt service and helpful staff. The manager Jason went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed. It's a great, clean economical place to stay in Vegas for business or pleasure. Great bargain!

Reviews.Title: “we loved it and we'll stay again.”
Reviews.Author: kyeaine1
Reviews.Content: The staff were very friendly and nice. The lobby, diner and rooms were very clean. My daughter forgot her toothbrush and she was given one free of no charge. They free shuttle to airport and to the strip.

Reviews.Title: “Best Western McCarran Rocks”
Reviews.Author: RichieD71
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for business last week. Everything was remarkable. I loved the fact I was able to take the free shuttle to the strip each morning for my meetings. Great free high speed internet access also meant that I was able to get all my work done when I got back to the hotel. Special thanks to the housekeeping ladies. They did a wonderful job in cleaning my room, everything was spotless.

Reviews.Title: “Second Visit”
Reviews.Author: Tanaug
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd time at this hotel. This time I was there with my friends. We all loved the hotel and definitely will be back again. Excellent staff and rooms, just like last visit. Well done to the hotel for keeping an excellent hotel. Special thanks to Jason who helped us with some show tickets.

Reviews.Title: “Much better experience than the last time we stayed here.”
Reviews.Author: BowlingGrandma2
Reviews.Content: Clean, quiet room. Check-in was quick and efficient. You can leave your car for 7 days after an one night stay. The shuttle left on time and the driver was courteous. Our pick up at the airport when we returned was speedy. The experience with the shuttle was so much better than when we stayed here in the past. We did not try the continental breakfast but there were people in the breakfast room when we left for the airport at 6am.

Reviews.Title: “Lying”
Reviews.Author: kelseyyork
Reviews.Content: We found a room saver book in one of the rest areas for Nevada. The coupon had this hotel for $45.00 a night, and that they were required to honor the coupon. Of course, the place was at 99% occupancy since it was Saturday night, but they did not honor the coupon. We ended up paying $120 per night per room, and the rooms we got only had one bed. We needed two in one room. I feel like with Best Western being so close to the strip, they should have taken the coupon and at least had roll out beds for $120 a night. (If I had known it would have been this much before, I would have booked at the Hyatt for a similar price) I will be having a nice night sleeping on the floor or in the car.

Reviews.Title: “nice place”
Reviews.Author: denightingale
Reviews.Content: It was a time of personal retreat, and I had a nice relaxing time. Great if you are a non smoker, I did not care much for the casinos and was glad to see the other sites of the City.

Reviews.Title: “A very nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: dancerme
Reviews.Content: We always stay at this particular hotel as it is clean neat, and has good service. We are able to park and fly and leave our car there for free for a week. The rates are very good and always a pleasing experience. Plus a shuttle right to the airport and back in a matter of minutes. The hotel staff always try and accommodate their guests who stay there. We have stayed many times and took advantage of the park and fly. Works out so perfect for us, and have recommended it to others who may be flying in and out of Vegas.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay - 1 Night”
Reviews.Author: Amit T
Reviews.Content: I needed a good hotel to stay for one night before travelling next day. Good about the hotel: 1. Free Pickup from Airport (even at 11:30 PM @ night) 2. Free wifi internet in room 3. Free Breakfast Buffet 4. Only 10 minutes from McCarrn Intn'l Airport 5. Huge King Size bed and very clean room, sheets, blankets Not so good: Room was not very big, the king size bed took most of the space.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service and very nice hotel - especially for the price”
Reviews.Author: vangos7
Reviews.Content: The best things about this hotel were the fantastic service and the really fast wifi network, which was the best I've seen in a while in a motel. Everyone at reception was extremely helpful throughout our stay, and there were always complementary sweets, fruit and drinks. The shuttle service to the airport is punctual and extremely fast (the hotel is very close to the airport anyway). The rooms were spacious, comfortable and clean, the beds also good. We paid around $50 per night, and for that price you cannot beat the quality of service we received. The only negative thing I can say about this hotel is that it is not conveniently located for the Strip, but if you don't mind driving down there (parking is free anyway), or if you are staying here for the proximity to the airport, this is perfect.

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE,DON'T STAY HERE!!!!”
Reviews.Author: neharishi10
Reviews.Content: Room was horrible.. as soon as i got into room my body started itching... I called up the front desk for anextra sheet and they told me that housekeeping is not there so can't send the sheet. Crappy place. Don't ever stay here.

Reviews.Title: “5 Stars?? Really”
Reviews.Author: TravelWarrior1
Reviews.Content: These people keep to referring to this place as a hidden gem, wonderful find......... Did we stay at the same place?? This place had a heavy musty almost smokey smell in the lobby and the rooms. The floor between the bed and the wall was actually grey from all the dust. My wife has allergies and within an hour of arriving in the room was starting to lose her voice and by morning her voice was almost gone. The carpets were dirty throughout the room and this was supposed to be one of their renovated rooms. Not the best area in Vegas. If you have small children you should stay somewhere else. They were quoting $69 to people calling in for a room. Spend the extra $11 - $21 and stay elsewhere, especially if you have a family. We checked out early and moved to Mandalay Bay and they have a body surfing pool with real sand. It was amazing. My kids thanked me over and over again. Worth every penny. I have stayed at many Best Westerns and this was the worst so far. I am one of their Diamond club members (top tier of their program) so if I give it a negative review it has to be pretty bad. This is also the first review I have ever written so you have to know that I wasn't impressed. Hidden Gem.......... Really? I would say keep looking...........

Reviews.Title: “Wow”
Reviews.Author: Sangchulpark
Reviews.Content: I stay at this place very frequently. I love this place. The front desk staff is very kind and expecially the managers Jason, John, James these guys are really friendly and courteous.   The beds are also comfortable and free breakfast are nice too. I think this is really nice but not.. soooooper nice so.. I just put 4.3 stars ^^

Reviews.Title: “Very Dirty..had a reservation for 7 nights via Orbitz...checked in, went to the room...did not stay one night!”
Reviews.Author: jackiebhoch
Reviews.Content: We booked thru Orbitz, was not looking for a lot of ammenities...was in town to visit our grandbabies. We just wanted a clean room to sleep in as we planned on spending all our "awake" time @ our son's home. The room was not clean. When we opened the door to the room, the smell of Aerosol Air Freshener was very intense. The carpet along the baseboard was shaded w/dust, the Air conditioning unit was old and loud, bathroom was dirty, carpet stained.....I lifted the mattress and the bed skirt had yellow stains on it. The entire room made us feel as though we had bugs crawling all over us. The facility is older, but that is no excuse for it being dingy and dirty. I asked for a credit for the 7 nights, night manager claimed he called the General Manager and offered to credit us for 6 nights and charge for 1 night....I asked why they would charge 1 night if I chose not to stay. I asked to speak to the General Manager, ... was told they would call and connect him to me....then rec'd a call from night manager, he claimed general Manager was @ the airport boarding a plane and agreed to credit the full amount. Definately not a positive experience and I felt as though the night manager wasn't actually talking to the General Manager....but was playing games. I would NOT recommend this facility if you are looking for a clean inn. Please note-in the lobby was a large sign if you submitted a positive comment on their faciltiy, you would get a free gift! Perhaps that is why I saw positive comments on this hotel while researching in preparation for our trip to Vegas.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: rhenders
Reviews.Content: The staff is great and go out of the way to make things happen

Reviews.Title: “Royalty service for a JOE”
Reviews.Author: Texas_Tourist214
Reviews.Content: From the time that I arrived the staff was eager to assit me with any of my request.The breakfast in the morning is AMAZING to say the least and its FREE!!!! I stayed for 3 nights and every employee that I encountered had a bright smile that made me feel at home.The room was clean and more than what I expected from a Best Western they sure do keep up with Vegas strip rooms, the bed was comfy and the pillows were phenomenal !! The hotel offers a FREE shuttle to the vegas strip that was a plus !! If you are in Vegas this is the place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Just for one night only”
Reviews.Author: LadyValkyrie99
Reviews.Content: This hotel is ok for a one night stay. I would not recommned it for extended periods while staying in Vegas. We had a long flight coming in and just wanted a place to rest and recharge before beginning our week long vacation. As soon as we pulled up, there were police men speaking with a homeless person who looked as though she was trying to get out of the wind (it was very very windy that day). After that, we were sent to the third floor that overlooked the back parking lot and also where the only working ice machine was located just outside our room. All night people were getting ice (literally heard the cubes dropping into the buckets) which interrupted my sleep. After my shower, I walked across the carpeted floor and my feet were black. That is gross. The remote control for the TV did not work so we asked for more batteries thinking the batteries were the cause. Nope, that did not fix the problem so we relied on the old way of manually turning on and off the TV. Then at 5:00 to approximately 5:45 am a garbage truck was emptying the dumpsters out back and there was a bus parked in the way which meant the truck driver had to do some fancy manuvering to get to the dumpsters. Each time he backed up, the reverse "beep-beep-beep" was engaged so needless to say I was awake very early that day. I should have know there would be noise problems when we entered the room and there were earplugs provided on the nightstand. It is very close to the airport so you do hear plane/jet noise as well. The breakfast area is very, very small and the quality of food/coffee provided was not very good. I would recommend this place only if you have to. I have stayed at a lot of Best Westerns and this by far is the worst.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay with helpful employees”
Reviews.Author: TnGran
Reviews.Content: Great value for the money. Front desk (John) was extremely helpful with suggestions for touring Vegas and safety factors. Room was on first level and had some noise with front desk check in but not a major factor. Room was very large with two qn beds, fridge, micro and flat panel tv. Was very clean and comfortable. Their consultant, that works during the week, was also very courteous and helpful fixing small problems that we had with room almost immediately. Overall very pleased with stay of three nights. Hotel does provide ear plugs if needed but did not have an issue with plane noise while there.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Best Western I have ever been!”
Reviews.Author: Dudeneverstop
Reviews.Content: First, I was not really impressed by the staff, which was not very friendly and helpful. The breakfast place is a brilliant demonstration of all you want to AVOID! Such a tiny place, chairs on a hallway... and food is basic. Also car access is extremelly bad and dangerous (coming from the stip, it is very difficult to enter the parking from Paradise road) + Paradise road is one way only so you need to do several turn around to go back to the Strip. Noisy and disappointing hotel.

Reviews.Title: “25th Anniversary - wedding vow renewal”
Reviews.Author: dasaunders
Reviews.Content: We were very disappointed at the results of the service that we have "not" received from this location. 3 nights our air conditioning was out - in July - and we were told since July 2010 that we would be receiving a voucher for free nights stay at any Best Western - todate we still have not received it and they continue to make excuses as to why we haven't.

Reviews.Title: “Best Western is the Best and McCarran Inn is no exception !!”
Reviews.Author: TheWeTourUSA
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at Best Western Inns for the past 2 months and intend to stay there for at least the rest of this year. I am walking across America for the benefit of Special Needs Kids and Best Western is a family oriented hotel family. I have been treated at The McCarran Inn from the General Manager John , the Director of Sales Jason to the desk auditors ad housekeeping staff like I am one of their family. The amenties are too numerous to list but suffice to say that they are all here.I take advantage of a great continental breakfast every morning and spend time on my laptop connected to the free Wi-Fi while I'm relaxing by the pool after my day of work. There is also a shuttle to take you to where the action is.The rooms are spacious and the beds and bedding are brand new. The atmosphere is plush and and meticulously maintained. I highly recommend the McCarran Inn for travelers coming to Las Vegas. It is also convenient to the airport so flights are easy to make without delay. I will never stay anywhere else when I come to Vegas !!!

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME STAY!”
Reviews.Author: MinasMom
Reviews.Content: I would stay here again. This was a great hotel and the staff was very helpfull and nice. THe rooms were cleam and the breakfast was great. If I needed anything all I had to do was ask and it was there. I was in Las Vegas for my daughter and her new hubbys wedding and Was there for 3 nights. I highly recomend it. Oh when they tell you your right by the airport::: no worries not one time did the planes wake me up. IF your alight sleeper they have earplugs on the table when you walk in. THANKS guys for a wonderful stay!!! CIndy Moranec, Michigan

Reviews.Title: “unexiting overnight stay but close to the airport”
Reviews.Author: dunera
Reviews.Content: A rather dour hotel with brown paint and dark green carpets. Rooms are rather small but ok for an overnight stay. About a mile from the strip and you need a car to access. Basic continental breakfast. flat screen tv, poor towels. Good heated pool and furniture. Internet access good. Good value considering Las Vegas. Good reception,, Close to airport.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for Thomas and Mack events”
Reviews.Author: KOOLGMA
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a First Robotic regional competition. Our group came from Mesa, AZ with 30 teenage students. Jason Abbott in sales met all of our needs. We couldn't have had a better experience. His advice of where to eat with a group worked out perfect. The motel staff were so kind and patient. They are the best! The free breakfast was delicious, only thing is that we could have used a few more tables. This is not the motels fault, there were two large teams staying here and we all had to leave at the same time. Thank you to the staff and Jason for helping make our trip happen without any complications.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Find”
Reviews.Author: justin057
Reviews.Content: I got in to town late on Friday night and this was the first place I found that had a decent rate and availability. I couldn’t be picky so I checked in and they gave me a big room with a King bed. I was surprised at how clean the hotel was and the Front Desk staff was very friendly. The Agent made small talk while he was checking me in and recommended some restaurants near the hotel. I found the room to be more than adequate in size. The bed looked clean and inviting, and it was comfortable! I got a great night’s sleep. In the morning, I just stopped by the breakfast room for some toast and coffee and was satisfied with the spread. Other guests seemed to be enjoying their juice and waffles. It wasn’t a huge buffet but it was definitely sufficient considering it was free. Unfortuately they only had ground floor rooms, I typically like rooms on the upper floors. But I got in late so I didnt really have any choice. Overall, I had a very quick but pleasant stay here and would have no problem staying again or recommending to someone else. As a frequent Best Western guest, I can say that this hotel was in great condition and a great value!

Reviews.Title: “not bad for the price....”
Reviews.Author: beejuju
Reviews.Content: my friend and i stayed two night at the Best Western McCarran. We called from the airport and it took over an hour to get the shuttle, the man was very kind but we were tired and ready to get to our room. We were located right by the desk and it was very noisy all night, i finally put a blanket in front of the door to keep the noise down the first night. The next night that did not work as there was a large group booked into the hotel and they seemed to be partying all night in the lobby, the next morning the same group was up at the crack of dawn. I was surprised that there was no airport noise. The breakfast was good as a perk. The value for the money was good but staff needs to be aware that people are trying to sleep and help keep the noise down.

Reviews.Title: “A Motel 6 is like the Bellagio compared to this place....”
Reviews.Author: wookiee6969
Reviews.Content: The Las Vegas Best Western McCarran inn was horrible. It smelled of old musty cigarettes and was dirty. It looked like it had never been renovated since it was built...1960s? None of the ice machines worked. Our room never had a shower curtain (even when asked for one) and the Continental breakfast was pathetic. You were better off asking for scraps from the dumpster at the next-door gas station. The dumpster had more variety as well. The pool was "warm" however, I doubt it has been cleaned in months. Floating Walmart bags and cigarette lighters were a turn-off to taking a dip. My kids who love to swim even turned away from it. All in all, the stay was extremely disappointing and will never stay here again. There are so many other choices and am kicking myself for even considering this place. I guess this is the perfect place to say "you get what you pay for". My advice to other travelers to Vegas, don't waste your time and money....stay somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap hotel ideal for overnight stay near airport - good breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Riddler1
Reviews.Content: It's cheap and cheerful, so don't expect a deluxe hotel ! On the plus side, it's close to the airport, with a free shuttle bus, and the selve serve breakfast (cereal, waffles, toast, coffee and juice) was basic but good quality On the negative side, the towels were thread bear and needed replacing and our room was near the noisy ice machine and at the back of the hotel facing the airport - adding to the noise factor Good value for money and clean - fine for one night

Reviews.Title: “It was a very comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: MinnesotaBound54
Reviews.Content: The room was very comfortable with nice pillows and a comfortable bed. The room was very clean. The only drawback was the noise from the airplanes, but we wanted a hotel close to the airport so we could shuttle early in the morning so we expected the noise, but we were tired so it didn't really bother us. The price was reasonable too.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for the money”
Reviews.Author: BCvisitor1
Reviews.Content: We did a one night stay to catch a plane the next day. The service was good, as was the breakfast. The price was excellent (using our loyalty and CAA discount. The room was great with two exceptions. The building is 100% non smoking however we noticed a smoke smell to the mattress as if it had been previously used in a smoking room. We were at the back of the building and the noise of aircraft taking off could be heard but was not bothersome. The noise of the trucks moving around on the lot behind us early in the morning did come through however. The swimming pool was being repaired but we did not need it. A bit of a walk from the strip but free shuttle to the MGM. Overall, still good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Just a basic place to sleep if you need to be close to airport”
Reviews.Author: beetlesgrandpa
Reviews.Content: a two night orbitz stay, my wife felt so uncomfortable that we just walked away after the first night and forfeited the second nights fee. Rooms are ok, but seemed to be a "seedy" crowd in lobby every time we were there. It has lower price than others in the area for a reason. If you just need a place to sleep between flights this will work, but dont take your family. Also, it is beside a shuttle company lot and you continually here the back up beeping of the vans. If you stay ask for a north side room.

Reviews.Title: “The staff was very freindly, helpful and curtious”
Reviews.Author: DanandSally
Reviews.Content: My wife and I where celebrating her birthday and just wanted a stress free fun week. we where not at all disappointed. The week was all we wanted and wmore.

Reviews.Title: “Help and Understanding When You Need It”
Reviews.Author: ssmith7
Reviews.Content: My travel started off rocky because I didn't realize until I was in the airport going to Vegas that I had completely left all my money at home. So It was a headache trying to get in touch with to see if they can spot me some money until I get back home in 2days. Let me tell you, when you are at your lowest, you find out who is there for you and who is not. The guy I was going to see, completely stood me up too, didn't find that out till I got there. When I got to the hotel, I realized that I forgot to put my money on my bank card and so the hotel wanted the entire money for the stay and $100 on top of that in cash, in which I didn't have because my money at home. After back and forth with the receptionist, the Manager stepped in and had an attitude at first but I firmly let him know that I'm stuck and was trying to get touch with someone. He worked something out that night so that I had somewhere to sleep, and said that if I had a certain amount by check out tommorrow morning I could keep my room for the next night and to see if I could get in contact with someone. Well I thought I had help but by noon that next day, I found out I was lied to by a friend. I had to check out and the same Manager allowed me to hang out in the lobby and go view Vegas while I was trying to change my flight to go home that day or get the money. They also allowed me to keep my luggage in their office to help me. The flights were all booked and I still had no help, it was 4pm and I had no where to stay or sleep. A random person who I cannot name heard my circumstance and gave me $20. Then one friend back at home said she could pay with her credit card, so the Manager figured out a way to get her information to pay for my room that 2nd night so I could go home the next day. I know this review is long but the Manager or stand in Manager at this hotel was amazing at really trying to help me with my circumstance. The rooms were great and comfortable and clean. The shuttle only goes till 11pm that picks u up to and from the Vegas Strip, it also takes you to and from the airport. Overall the shuttle guys were great too, had an incident with one being really late to pick up, but other than that it was good. One of them actually drove to take me to get something to eat.There is a corner store around the corner and its in Walking distance of a few restraurants. I would definitely recommend this hotel to other travelers. There are still some good people out there.

Reviews.Title: “Nice little find for our overnight stay”
Reviews.Author: paixful
Reviews.Content: We had a huge room (are they all this big? 2 queen beds with a pull out couch and plenty of room for the kids to play) and the beds were so comfy!! You get used to the sound of the airplanes, which could be a downfall. As well, we had a nice flat screen tv but it was pretty fuzzy on some channels. Our fridge didn't work but the staff immediately gave us some options on how to deal with that. The staff were excellent and the shuttle to the strip was a nice bonus we weren't expecting. Basic continental breakfast and we are on our way to the next city!

Reviews.Title: “The Worst Best Western I have stayed in”
Reviews.Author: Jess1820
Reviews.Content: I did not like the Best Western here...AT ALL. The room was very small and designed poorly. The toilet was very short and the door would always hit you. The shower head's water was very small and weak. It would go from warm water to cold water constantly. The beds were very bouncy and uncomfortable. They gave you 3 pillows which was nice. The housecleaning people gave us a bunch of soap every night, so on the day of our checkout, we had 5 bars of unused soap...WTF lol. The free breakfast was nice, I liked the waffles and juices. It was also very noisy at night because the airport is very close to the hotel. It didn't bother me too much. They offer free Wi-Fi so that made the stay much better. I should have stayed at the Holiday Inn Express like I did on my previous trip to Vegas, but no, I wanted to try the Best Western instead....Terrible choice.

Reviews.Title: “Very Accomodating”
Reviews.Author: rachaelmz
Reviews.Content: We brought our women's basketball team here to play UNLV. The rooms were spacious and clean. The service was friendly. The breakfast was pretty good. The location was easy to find and had plenty of room for our charter bus. Overall we were very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice experience”
Reviews.Author: 2WheelTravelers
Reviews.Content: With no where to stay on last night in Vegas, I found a room at BW McCarran Inn, very reasonable rates. It was clean, quite and charming with a pleasant staff. Location was great for the last night having to be a the airport by 6 a.m.. Hotel also has a shuttle to take to either the Strip or airport, which is a plus. Thank you for the great experience

Reviews.Title: “Cozy lil area”
Reviews.Author: Agca2793
Reviews.Content: If you don't want to pay for outlandish hotel prices on the strip, this is the place to go to. The only downfall was it's location. Although it is located right outside of the airport, it is located on a one way street which adds on to the taxi cab rides if you want to head to a specific place on the strip. The staff was friendly and helpful. The beds were the most comfortable beds that I've ever slept in.

Reviews.Title: “Helpful and convenient”
Reviews.Author: PamperedMom
Reviews.Content: We spent three nights and four days with 115 teenagers and it was very nice. Jason worked with me for weeks in advance assuring me that our stay would be what we expected it to be. He even went as far as to help accommodate our food needs. The breakfast ladies never cringed when we showed up in masses. They even cheered us on for our marching competition. The beds were very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, ala in all.”
Reviews.Author: dodgerbob55
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay here, although we were there for a funeral. The room was nice and we enjoyed the breakfast, though I wish there had been "Sugar-Free: syrup, for the waffles. I like the idea of going green and using the key card to activate the outlets & lights, however, I don't like the idea of having to set the clock radio. I am presuming that when the key card is taken out, the outlet inactivates. This would mean one would have to set the clock every time. There are self setting clock radios, that are not too expensive. That would work well in this situation.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and safe at the BW McCarran Inn”
Reviews.Author: suec18
Reviews.Content: We met my sister in Vegas and the McCarran Inn worked so well. It was clean, no smoking, and quiet and comfortable. Room service and the house keepers did a great job of taking care of us. The breakfast was great every morning. Sue

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: pdoggy5
Reviews.Content: This hotel was clean and close to the Rental Car Center for the airport which was why I picked it. It had a great continental breakfast. It was quiet and I would recommend it for the budget traveler who just wants a clean, comfortable place to stay. I don't know what it had for other amenities because we didn't get there until after midnight and just went righty to bed and then we were up and gone first thing in the morning after having the free breakfast. Parking was free and there was lots of it. This hotel is near the strip. It offers shuttle service to and from the Strip and the airport but we didn't use it so I can't rate it.

Reviews.Title: “Best Western McCarran Inn”
Reviews.Author: VanIsleGal
Reviews.Content: This hotel definitely needs some cleaning or a renovation. We were given a room on the bottom floor. It smelt so heavy of a spray that we asked for another room. Also the room was old & tired, and heavy dust all around edges, & carpet was soiled. 2nd floor room was a little better. Near the airport if one needs that.

Reviews.Title: “The right price, at nearby strip location with shuttle!”
Reviews.Author: centurysleuth
Reviews.Content: Couldn't have had a better location, and shuttle to airport, MGM & Hard Rock is perfect! Clean & safe hotel with all amenities. Not looking to blow your budget on a room that you're only go to sleep in, this is perfect. Employees are friendly & very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel”
Reviews.Author: JulesMilll
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel as it was close to the airport and as we were only staying one night it seemed a good place to stop. This was not a bad hotel, but I have stayed in better Best Western Hotels. If I needed an overnight stop near the hotel again, I would probably stay somewhere else, but for the price we paid it was a bargain..

Reviews.Title: “an ok place for good price, don't expect more than you paid for”
Reviews.Author: tweetster
Reviews.Content: low price and ok rooms, nothing special about this hotel. very convenient for the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Located near the airport - great for the layover between flights.”
Reviews.Author: j_bennet
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night because I had the night between two flights. The hotel is a 5 minutes drive from the airport, and there's a free shuttle. The room was great, clean, and very spacious, and stocked with everything that I needed for the night. What I didn't like: - the shuttle does not ride 24 hours a day, it starts at 5am and stops at 11:30pm. So if you arrive later than that, you'll need to pay for taxi. - the window AC unit (noisy). Switched it off for the night.

Reviews.Title: “Not on the strip, but reflected in the value for money”
Reviews.Author: blot57
Reviews.Content: We used this hotel as an overnight place after a 14 hour series of flights from Manchester, England. The website of the hotel represents the hotel more accurately than most; it is a clean, good value place with a free airport shuttle. The site is close to the runway, but we heard no aircraft noise whilst inside the hotel, even though you can see a line of inbound planes as you stand in the car park. Check in was easy enough, there were two receptionists behind the desk. One of them was a little too chauvinistic to other employees and some of the other guests, but it didn’t stop him from checking us in efficiently. The rooms have no safes and so I asked to use the safe deposit box at reception. This was not as easy as checking in, but we got there after going through the long list of conditions and penalties associated with the safe deposit box. There were a number of vending machines around the place, but all of the ones on the ground floor had ‘out of order’ signs on them. We asked for the nearest restaurants for dinner and were directed a mile up the road towards the German Beer cellar. We walked there, but decided to get a cab back; the hotel is not surrounded by roads which are frequented by pedestrians. The bathroom was really clean and had the usual Best Western toiletries. The bed allowed us to sleep for several hours undisturbed ready for a six hour drive the following morning. One surprising observation was the state of the sheets. They were spotlessly clean, but were not pressed, and so looked as though the previous guest had only just left the room. It wasn’t so, but they looked odd. The included breakfast was a bit of a scrum both to get the food and then to get a table, but no one was too aggressive and the lady looking after the buffet worked very hard to keep on top of things, most commonly sorting out the waffle machine after unsupervised kids had not followed the instructions. Check out and the return of our safe deposit box contents were really easy and we got a lift in the shuttle bus to the car hire place. Overall as an airport hotel, it’s a good economical choice, but it is never an alternative for a Strip hotel.

Reviews.Title: “pleasurable stay”
Reviews.Author: rhenders
Reviews.Content: I stay at this hotel everyday monday-friday..Always works out for me staff in very kind.

Reviews.Title: “unless you have to be at the las vegas airport and use their shuttle, take a "real" las vegas hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kortenbergtraveler
Reviews.Content: well yes this best western is close to the airport in las vegas, and has a shuttle to it, and has the typical buffet breakfast with plastic tableware, and the rooms are big and clean and with comfortable beds, but that's it ... why would you stay here unless you need to be early or late at the airport ? why did i book here i still wonder .... yes, there is a kind of swimming pool, the size of two parking spaces; why do i compare with parking spaces ? well, the swimming pool is on the parking lot ... my advice, take a hotel in "new" vegas, or better, downtown

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Staff and Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: JulieK34
Reviews.Content: I have to say I am pleasantly surprised by my stay at this hotel. Not only was the staff amazingly friendly, there was also a delicious complimentary breakfast every morning. The hotel was very close to the Strip and offered free shuttle service to airport or Strip if needed. If you're looking for a clean hotel with a great price, this is the place to be!

Reviews.Title: “Vacation”
Reviews.Author: jander07
Reviews.Content: My family went to Vegas for a weekend get away staying at this hotel. It was clean, price was excellent for 4 people, comfortable bed, free breakfast (kids enjoyed the waffle) and most of all it was near at the airport.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: nette0420
Reviews.Content: this hotel is very convenient close to the airport and near the strip, the offer free shuttle from hotel to the strip the rooms were descent for the price breakfast was good although needed more eating space. my family and i had a good time i will recommend this hotel!!

Reviews.Title: “Unplanned Stay”
Reviews.Author: BurghNative1967
Reviews.Content: I had a cancelled flight and this was the place they sent me. Nice suprise! I would recommend this hotel to others. I was expecting bottom of the barrel and found it to be almost to the top. Thank you to the staff and management for making this unplanned stay a future planned stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JenniferC1969
Reviews.Content: I stayed here just 2 nights, and the staff were courteous, the beds were comfortable and the location was perfect for me - off Strip!

Reviews.Title: “Just a place to sleep”
Reviews.Author: Enjoytravel310
Reviews.Content: Customer service is great and helpful. The room is clean and has things such as an iron, ironing board, hair dryer,coffe maker and great beds. Parking if you are driving and very, very close to the airport if you are flying. Felt secured. The hall way carpets look dirty and worn-out, something that gives you a first bad impression of the place but as I mentioned the room was clean. The room was too small. There is no restaurant, if I am not mistaken, and in the morning breakfast was basic.I sat in the small dining area they had next to the small kitchen where you serve yourself breakfast but the dining area lacks something, that many people just decides to take their breakfast back to their rooms. I ended-up taking my family somewhere else to eat breakfast. I spent only one day at this hotel. Maybe I did not enjoy it well enough because it was not along Las Vegas Strip.

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: oxymoron2010
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with my friends for a couple of nights. The location was good. Close to the airport and the strip.There was a shuttle service provided by the hotel and it was quite helpful. The breakfast was ok. Nothing to write home about. The bed was fine. The staff was helpful. It was perfect for the price we paid. I would surely recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Recommend for Business”
Reviews.Author: kparb001
Reviews.Content: I was recently in Vegas on business and was set up at Best Western McCarran by my company. The hotel turned out to be the perfect location for my while on business due to the free high-speed internet (free), the large rooms with work desk, and the free morning paper. Breakfast was not fancy but sufficient, and again, it was free so I did not have to use my per diem. Plus, I was able to upgrade to a suite which had a microwave and refrigerator which was perfect for keeping snacks. I would recommend this property to other business travelers and will definitely request to stay here on future business trips.

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: muellerga
Reviews.Content: Before reserving my room I explicitly questioned if there was transportation service by the hotel at midnight because I had a 2:00 a.m. flight. I booked the hotel for the afternoon to rest and refresh before taking a "red eye" flight. I was assured there was a 24 hour shuttle. When I arrived I was told that the shuttle did not run 24 hours and I would have to get a taxi. The front desk clerk was rude and yelled that they never had a shuttle. He could have been more sympathetic and offered the number of a few private group shuttles that were available.

Reviews.Title: “memories of a lifetime”
Reviews.Author: im_not_agirl
Reviews.Content: i cant compare to any other hotels in vegas since it was my first time in the u.s. as far as i am concern i have no complaint about our three days stay in this hotel.awesome staff,foods were great although only breakfast are free,not bad... wonderful vacay.i wanna go back to vegas.i dont mind going back to best western mc carran inn.love it!

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here in the summer!”
Reviews.Author: klove83
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed for one night in June when the temperature in Vegas was about 90+ degrees. We were told my the front desk that we couldn't turn our A/C units down past "72" or it would "freeze the unit". I rather freeze the unit then suffer through another uncomfortably hot night in my room. We called the front desk to ask if we could please please lower it to 70 and again we got the whole"freeze" excuse. Listen, its 90 degrees in vegas, you need you're A/C to be AT LEAST 69 degrees. I didn't sleep a wink. I had to be up early the next day to drive hours back to california. Pool was dirty and uninviting, halls were a ghost town--I can see why. However, the bed was comfortable--I'll give them that.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing special, but decent rooms and a good breakfast”
Reviews.Author: rdiddy1234
Reviews.Content: The hotel is about a three minute drive from the strip. The person behind the front desk, when we checked in, was not very personable. Our room was so-so. The water coming out of the bathroom faucet kind of smelled like sulfur, or something. Also, it was hard to figure out the A/C unit--it kept shutting off even though it was set below the room temp. The bed was nice enough, though. The complimentary breakfast was pretty good, and there's a great little eating area for it. The swimming pool looked very small--we didn't have time to go in it.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, inconsistant shuttle”
Reviews.Author: BowlingGrandma2
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel through Park-Sleep-Fly, so that we could leave our car there while we were traveling. The hotel looks like it was recently remodeled. The public areas and the rooms look brand new. The bed was comfortable and the bedding was elegant. The breakfast room looked really nice also. We spent the night and used the hotel shuttle to get to the airport in the morning. We missed the 7am shuttle because the driver left 5 minutes early. We made sure we were 10 minutes early for the 7:30am shuttle. When the driver wasn't there at 7:30, the front desk had to call him. The shuttle left about 8 minutes late and the driver didn't talk to us at all. Not even to ask us what airline to stop at. After our trip, we called the hotel for pickup from the airport. The afternoon driver was friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: DanishTraveller74
Reviews.Content: We stayed 4 nights at this hotel when visiting Las Vegas. I thought it was quite nice andreasonably priced. Rooms were clean and the beds comfortable. I didn't hear the airport too much. We actually intended only to stay a couple of nights and then try one of the Strip hotels, but after just a couple of hours at the Strip, we were glad we were overnighting away from there. The hotel has shuttle service the the MGM grand several times a day, which is convenient as you don't want to bring your car there. All in all, a pleasant stay.

Reviews.Title: “Would not chose this hotel again or recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: TravelGuru03
Reviews.Content: I didn't enjoy my stay at this hotel. The reception staff were not particularly helpful. When I asked for my room to be changed, it was done with an attitude. The room and bathroom were clean. The complimentary breakfast was limited in its content. Facilities are basic. The swimming pool area was uninviting, no seat cushions or pool towels available when I requested. When I asked to extend my check out time by an hour on Sunday , the request was refused. The shuttle bus was also unavailable to go to the airport at mid day. However the driver (who was standing in the reception area) kindly offered to take me as "he had nothing else to do". All in all not a pleasant experience.

Reviews.Title: “Location and Service First Class”
Reviews.Author: Tanaug
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Best Western McCarran Hotel last week. Both my wife and I had a wonderful stay at the hotel. We stayed for 2 nights, and enjoyed the service and clean rooms. Great hotel, I would recommend to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “clean, comfortable and well fitted”
Reviews.Author: gofore
Reviews.Content: Best Western McCarran Inn has it all! It is clean, comfortable and well fitted including in room internet access and a swimming pool. No casino as it is not located on the Strip, but we were looking for a quiet place therefore it was excellent, not to mention the price we got for it- 28$ only a night for a double room, can you believe it? (We booked it through Easy Click Travel) So in case you're looking for a good budget minded motel, that's certainly a place to consider

Reviews.Title: “Top Notch”
Reviews.Author: nanMorgantown_WV
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Best Western Mccarran Inn on the last day of our vacation (12/11) We chose the hotel because of its proximity to the Airport. We had spent four days at the Bellagio and four days at El Tovar in the Grand Canyon. Although both hotels are famous, we strongly believe that we got much better service at your Inn. All the staff made sure that we got what we needed on our last night in Vegas and helped pave the way for a smooth Trip home Congratulations on a well-run hotel ! Nancy Abrams Morgantown, WV

Reviews.Title: “Nice Suprise”
Reviews.Author: BurghNative1967
Reviews.Content: I needed a hotel that was close enough to the strip and the airport and found this hotel online. I wasn't sure at first because the rate was so low but it fit my to main needs. What a suprse it was when I arrived and entered the nice lobby to be greeted by the front desk agent with a smile. My room was more than I thought it would be for the price and the staff was excellent. Very clean place, convenient and easily worth the money.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for price paid”
Reviews.Author: youbetyaaaaa
Reviews.Content: The staff was very pleasant. We took the shuttle to the strip and the airport which made everything very conveniant. The carpets need to be shampooed but other than that everything was excellent with our room. The breakfast is good for a continental breakfast. It's great for just a little something to hold you over. The staff said that they had recently renovated the lobby which looked amazing.

Reviews.Title: “Mixed feelings”
Reviews.Author: liesenluc
Reviews.Content: Best Western McCarran Inn, Mixed feelings. liesenluc, Brugge, Belgium Last year we stayed 4 nights at the McCarran Inn and we were very pleased with it. So this year we needed again a hotel near the Las Vegas airport for 1 night and so we booked 2 rooms at the bestwestern.com website. We could book the senior rate for the 2 rooms and I must say, it was very, very cheap. Prices were going down in Las Vegas (crisis??) and it was a bargain. I received my reservation confirmation and everything was OK untill 2 months later. I took a look at my reservations at the bestwestern.com website and I saw that my whole reservation was cancelled. I had not asked for that! I send a mail to the bestwestern.com and they answered me to contact the free phonenumber in Belgium. So I did. The person I spoke to, was very very helpfull. He looked in the computer to see what has happened and just said "What a mess"! All I could do was making a new booking. So I did, the price was a little higher than the original booking and so he adviced me to ask at BestWestern to have the original price, because it was not my fault. I send a mail and they mailed back that it was OK. I looked to my reservation confirmation at their website and yes, they adjusted the higher price to the original price for the 2 rooms. Everything OK again. When we arrived at the McCarran, we had to sign 2 papers, one for each room. We looked at the first paper, and the price was correct. We signed it and signed the second paper too, without taking a good look at it, because we thought that the second room had the same rate. Back home, we saw that the second room had a higher price, it was 13 USD more than the original price. I took again a look at my reservation confirmation at the bestwestern.com and I saw that the price for the second room had been changed after my booking to the higher price. Can this be done???? I was lucky that I took a copy from the original confirmation with the original prices. So I mailed to the McCarran and send them the copy, but I received no answer. Then I mailed to bestwestern.com and they answered me after a week, that they would pay the difference of 13 USD back to me, but without any explination of what happened. Very strange. About the hotel I must say that we were again very pleased with it. For our bargain price, it was very very good, quiet, good breakfast, nice renovated room , no fridge but all the rest is there, good shuttle service. So I should say, I can recommend it, but be aware about their administration!!! That is the reason I can only give it 2/5

Reviews.Title: “Small rooms with fleas”
Reviews.Author: FloridaTerry
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel a few years ago and it was nice. This time however is was horrible. We asked for a room on the first floor because we had a flight at 5:00 am and didnt want to disturb other guests. We were given a room on the 3rd floor and as far from the elevator as you can get. We had already waited 1 hour past the check in time and they said it would be another hour until a room would be ready. So we stayed , we were unable to sleep all night for the ice machine was right next to our room and made ice all night. To top it off my wife was bitten by fleas or something on neck and shoulders. Then on check out they over charged us and have yet to respond to us about it.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderfull Stay”
Reviews.Author: jayem23
Reviews.Content: Hotel was nice although minor improvements can be done. staff was very helpfull to our needs. Price was excellent..

Reviews.Title: “Clean room. Bring your own pillows.”
Reviews.Author: rtravels2go
Reviews.Content: Close and convenient to airport, and hotel offers free shuttle service. Basic breakfast - bread, mini muffins, cereal, plain oatmeal, hot waffles, coffee, tea, juice. 6 1/2" high decorative pillows look nice, but uncomfortable. Could not get replacement pillows from front desk as housekeeping was closed at 10pm. Stuffed some towels in the pillowcase. Room was nicely decorated and clean.

Reviews.Title: “Probably would have been better if it hadn't been for room location”
Reviews.Author: jgeezy
Reviews.Content: I booked this room with an employee rate so I'm not sure what the regular rate would be. Stayed in a room with a king bed. Room was clean and had the basics. There was a minor maintenance issue with one of the outlets being loose so that any cord that was plugged in it would fall out. Was kind of inconvenient. The only major gripe I had was that I was placed in a room right next to the housekeeping/breakfast storage room. Early in the morning, I was awakened to rather loud clanking and banging of breakfast items being either cleared away or put out, I'm not sure. And it was LOUD. I think I heard someone else go to the front desk and complain about it. Why you would put a room there is beyond me. Other than that, my stay was satisfactory. The staff was okay- they weren't overly friendly but I gues they did their job. The location was pretty close to the Strip. If you have a car-great, if not, then it might be kind of a walk.

Reviews.Title: “Feels like home”
Reviews.Author: allori
Reviews.Content: We had to go travel to Las Vegas on the spare of the moment to visit a sick relative. After reading lots of reviews from pass customers I chose Best Western McCarran Inn and was not disappointed. The room was very clean and staff very friendly and helpful. There was a problem with their internet system...too slow...however, I must say the reviews were not wrong about the great breakfast waiting for us in the morning. Overall, I would not hesitate to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “pretty quiet, near airport”
Reviews.Author: VacationLovingFamily
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night before catching an early flight out of Veags. The room was your average hotel room. It was clean and the bed linens were nice. For being so close to the airport I thought it was quiet. I didn't hear any planes, just some people/doors in the hallway a few times. The man at the desk was very nice and even offered to print our boarding passes for us. I would stay here again for the value.

Reviews.Title: “Service, Location, Convienence at a moderate price.”
Reviews.Author: jh4721
